Serpentor:




Serpentor's internal scanners told him Shadow Wing had died.

"NO!  WHO DO YOU THINK YOU ARE!?  I WASN'T DONE YET!" he kicked 
Shadow Wing's lifeless head a few times, taking a few steps back.  
Raising his launcher, he fired off a blast at her head, laughing 
maniaclly.
